name: Keep your coal
description:
Grab as many resources as you can before time runs out, and watch out for broken ladders!

Keep your coal (currently in development) is the first  game I have created that I felt may be somewhat good enough to show to the public. 

All feedback appreciated. Please let me know what you think.

Known Issues:
Needs balancing.
It's possible to find yourself in a position with no where to go.
Player is not always "fully" reset at the end of a round.
